message: I propose a fair, but advantageous, split. I get 90%, you get 10%. Let's get this over with!
Let's be reasonable. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This ensures a fair distribution and avoids further rounds, saving us both from the inflation penalty.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than your last offer. 60/40 split seems fair, considering the inflation we're both facing. Let's end this here.
